_header: Compatience pierces ruth and mercy stands
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 326.

BLAru285.First Lines:
Compatience persis reuth & marcy stoundisIn myddis my hert and
                    thirlis throw þe vanis…
BLAru285.Last Lines:
…My saule with sanctis saluiour resaifSen þat þi
                    passioun purgit my trespas

Banna.First Lines:
Compacience perssis Rewth and mercy stoundisIn myddis my hairt and
                    thirlis throw þe vanis…
Banna.Last Lines:
…My saule with sanctis sueit saluatur ressaif Sen that þi
                    passioun purgis my trespas

EDULaiii149.First Lines:
Compaiens pers rewcht and mercy stundisIn myddis myne hart and
                    thirlis throw þe banis…
EDULaiii149.Last Lines:
…my saul with sanctes suet saluatour rasaifsen þat
                    þi passioun purgit my praspas
